content.rendered:
Procedure

Rejuvenation

Visia
CO2 Laser
Book an appointment

In our clinic we guide our patients to discover how their body, face and skin are. We design specialized treatments to improve the quality of life of our patients, we integrate various medical specialties that will help you look and feel younger.

Thanks to countless studies and medical research, our team of specialists discovers the environmental, physical, genetic and dietary factors that increase or decrease the signs of aging.

There are many causes for which our skin is affected, sometimes not only age is a main factor but also different factors, both external and internal. Therefore, it is essential to know the real age of the skin through different studies and diagnoses by specialists.

1. VISIA

Calendar age is very different from biological age.

Before starting any treatment, it is necessary to know what conditions our skin is in, therefore, we resort to the latest technology to obtain accurate assessments. The VISIA facial diagnostic system is responsible for evaluating the state of your facial skin and determining the real age of your face.

Through this equipment, we will be able to assess multiple characteristics of the skin of your face and thus identify the conditions of your skin, both superficial and subcutaneous. Additionally, upon knowing the results of the diagnosis, a study is carried out on the lifestyle habits that you lead, so that you can start that path of change by making the right decisions, and you can feel and perceive your soft and healthy skin again.

Book an appointment

2. CO2 Laser

Comprehensive, comfortable and safe rejuvenation

Our Co2 Laser treatment improves flaccidity, texture and color of the skin, within a personalized treatment plan.

This wonderful technology works by creating thousands of microscopic perforations, leaving the tissue intact, which allows the upper layer of the skin to heal more quickly than with other conventional treatments.

CO2 Laser Characteristics

  1. Skin regeneration: this laser technology stimulates the growth of new collagen, improving skin texture, fighting fine wrinkles and expression lines.
  2. Porcelain Skin: Improves skin texture, creating a porcelain effect, recovering a youthful appearance, with a defined facial contour.
  3. Skin color: Eliminates pigmentary and vascular lesions, which allows to unify the color of the skin, reducing small broken capillaries.
Book an appointment

CO2 Laser Benefits

  • Improves the texture and luminosity of the skin
  • Reduces fine wrinkles and expression lines
  • Eliminates spots, spider veins and redness of the skin
  • Reduces acne scars and enlarged pores
  • Provides results in the short and medium term

Note of Interest: Remember that the results of each treatment depend on the medical diagnosis, laboratory results and follow-up of medical indications.

Success Stories

LASER MEGALIPOLYSIS
2 months after surgery
lost 22 kilos Yury Londoño Maria Alfaro LASER MEGALIPOLYSIS
3 months after surgery
lost 25 kilos
See More
